title: Food prices are surging in Russia. Is the war hitting Russians in the pocket?
summary_full: Russia's economy is hanging between stagnation and decline, and ordinary Russians are beginning to feel the pinch.
summary_public: Russia's economy is hanging between stagnation and decline, and ordinary Russians are beginning to feel the pinch.

RU.label: positive
